title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 157.4 - Certain non-conforming junkyards or scrap metal processing facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 157.4 - Certain non-conforming junkyards or scrap metal processing facilities

State Regulations

Any junkyard or scrap metal processing facility not
conforming with section
157.3
of this Part and lawfully in
existence on October 22, 1965 or lawfully along any highway made a part of the
interstate or primary highway system on or after October 22, 1965, may continue
to exist in non-conformance with section
157.3
of this Part until brought
into conformance therewith by action of the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
157.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
